languages.text: Переключайтесь между спутниками — для этого зажмите и удерживайте {console_bind|LeftBottom}, затем выберите персонажа с помощью {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} и отпустите {console_bind|LeftBottom}. В описании предметов указано сравнение с аналогичными, уже экипированными предметами выбранного персонажа.

traits.locale_text: Переключайтесь между спутниками — для этого зажмите и удерживайте {console_bind|LeftBottom}, затем выберите персонажа с помощью {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick} и отпустите {console_bind|LeftBottom}.. В описании предметов указано сравнение с аналогичными, уже экипированными предметами выбранного персонажа.

languages.text: You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.
languages.original_text: Переключайтесь между спутниками — для этого зажмите и удерживайте {console_bind|LeftBottom}, затем выберите персонажа с помощью {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} и отпустите {console_bind|LeftBottom}. В описании предметов указано сравнение с аналогичными, уже экипированными предметами выбранного персонажа.

traits.locale_text: You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Item descriptions contain comparisons with similar items that are already equipped by the character.

You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

languages.text: Puedes cambiar de miembros de grupo manteniendo {console_bind|LeftBottom}, seleccionando un personaje con {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} y soltando {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Las descripciones de los objetos contienen una comparativa con los objetos de la misma categoría que tenga equipados el personaje.
languages.original_text: You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

traits.locale_text: Puedes cambiar de miembros de grupo manteniendo {console_bind|LeftBottom}, seleccionando un personaje con {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick} y soltando {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Las descripciones de los objetos contienen una comparativa con los objetos de la misma categoría que tenga equipados el personaje.

languages.text: {console_bind|LeftBottom}を押しながら、{console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}でキャラクターを選択し、{console_bind|LeftBottom}を離すことでグループメンバーを切り替えることができる。アイテムの説明には、キャラクターがすでに装備してい同類のアイテムとの比較が含まれている。
languages.original_text: You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

traits.locale_text: {console_bind|LeftBottom}を押しながら、{console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}でキャラクターを選択し、{console_bind|LeftBottom}を離すことでグループメンバーを切り替えることができる。アイテムの説明には、キャラクターがすでに装備してい同類のアイテムとの比較が含まれている。

languages.text: 您可以切换队伍中的成员，先按住{console_bind|LeftBottom}，再按下{console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}来切换角色，之后松开{console_bind|LeftBottom}。您可以通过物品的描述部分，与角色当前装备的物品进行比较。
languages.original_text: You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

traits.locale_text: 您可以切换队伍中的成员，先按住{console_bind|LeftBottom}，再按下{console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}来切换角色，之后松开{console_bind|LeftBottom}。您可以通过物品的描述部分，与角色当前装备的物品进行比较。

languages.text: Du kannst zwischen Gruppenmitgliedern wechseln, indem du {console_bind|LeftBottom} gedrückt hältst, einen Charakter mit {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} auswählst und dann {console_bind|LeftBottom} loslässt. Gegenstandsbeschreibungen enthalten Vergleiche mit den entsprechenden Gegenständen, die der Charakter bereits ausgerüstet hat.
languages.original_text: You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

traits.locale_text: Du kannst zwischen Gruppenmitgliedern wechseln, indem du {console_bind|LeftBottom} gedrückt hältst, einen Charakter mit {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick} auswählst und dann {console_bind|LeftBottom} loslässt. Gegenstandsbeschreibungen enthalten Vergleiche mit den entsprechenden Gegenständen, die der Charakter bereits ausgerüstet hat.

languages.text: Pour passer d'un membre du groupe à l'autre, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|LeftBottom}, sélectionnez un personnage à l'aide de {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, puis relâchez {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Les descriptions des objets contiennent des comparaisons avec les objets correspondants dont dispose déjà le personnage.
languages.original_text: You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.

traits.locale_text: Pour passer d’un membre du groupe à l'autre, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|LeftBottom}, sélectionnez un personnage à l'aide de {console_bind|DPad}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, puis relâchez {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Les descriptions des objets contiennent des comparaisons avec les objets correspondants dont dispose déjà le personnage.

languages.text: {console_bind|LeftBottom} düğmesini basılı tutup {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick} ile bir karakteri seçip ardından {console_bind|LeftBottom} düğmesini bırakarak grup üyeleri arasında geçiş yapabilirsin. Eşya açıklamaları, karakter tarafından hâlihazırda kuşanılmış olan ilgili eşyalarla kıyaslamalar da içerir.
languages.original_text: You can switch between party members by holding {console_bind|LeftBottom}, selecting a character using {console_bind|DPadFull}/{console_bind|LeftStick}, and then releasing {console_bind|LeftBottom}. Item descriptions contain comparisons with any corresponding items already equipped by the character.
